experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline, transforming raw data into inferred values with comprehensive automated unit and integration testing. Optimized system scalability through time complexity improvements, enhancing overall performance. Troubleshot and resolved model build pipeline failures in staging and production environments using CloudWatch logs. Streamlined and automated DevOps processes by restructuring CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions. Implementing data export/import functionality for timeseries data purge and restore, improving database efficiency and data lifecycle management.
reference_context: Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline in a distributed system for transforming raw data to inferred values followed by end-to-end manual and automated unit testing and integration tests.
Did scaling and performance optimization to address scalability requirements by optimizing time complexity.
Diagnosed and remedied model build pipeline failures in staging and production environments using Cloudwatch logs.
Automated deployment DevOps process by restructuring CI/CD workflows using GitHub Actions.
experiences.reasoning: This position describes a highly technical and hands-on role with significant responsibilities in software and DevOps engineering, closely matching the detailed tasks in the resume.

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT and provided post-implementation support in Production environments for 2 international financial banking firms. Engineered 6 GUI based workflow runs for ETL pipelines with numerous tasks and integrated them with backend scripts to process data from Pre-staging to end-user report generation stage. Enhanced UI for Individual Assessment (IA) module based on XML Forms Framework by customizing 4 UI Forms and 8 PL/SQL scripts to process over 300k customer records by proposing to debug existing legacy code. Generated PL/SQL scripts for data manipulation and validation to automate manual tasks for filtering source data that helped reduce execution times by 20% while generating end-user reports containing customer data for over 6 months. Documented technical designs and deployed code packages across environments via WinSCP/PuTTY client-server apps.
reference_context: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT and provided post-implementation support in Production environments for 2 international financial banking firms.
Engineered 6 GUI based workflow runs for ETL pipelines with numerous tasks and integrated them with backend scripts to process data from Pre-staging to end-user report generation stage.

Enhanced UI for Individual Assessment (IA) module based on XML Forms Framework by customizing 4 UI Forms and 8 PL/SQL scripts to process over 300k customer records by proposing to debug existing legacy code.

Generated PL/SQL scripts for data manipulation and validation to automate manual tasks for filtering source data that helped reduce execution times by 20% while generating end-user reports containing customer data for over 6 months.
Documented technical designs and deployed code packages across environments via WinSCP/PuTTY client-server apps.
experiences.reasoning: The tasks, technologies, and responsibilities clearly align with a Software Development Engineer role as described in the resume, focusing on PL/SQL development and UI enhancements.

experiences.title: Graduate Services Assistant

experiences.description: Grader for CSE 536 Advanced Operating Systems course under the School of Computing and Augmented Intelligence (SCAI). Activities included preparing and reviewing coursework, assisting students during office hours, and grading assignments.

experiences.title: Embedded C++ Developer
experiences.description: Worked under Dr. Joby Antony to design software modules for ARM Cortex-M3 embedded server sensor device to measure subzero temperatures. Troubleshooted bugs and optimized the system to handle real-time sensor data via RPC transfer protocols.
reference_context: Worked under Dr. Joby Antony (MS Kent State University, Ohio, USA), Formerly Visiting Scientist, CERN, Geneva.
Designed software modules for ARM Cortex-M3 embedded server sensor device to measure subzero temperatures.
Troubleshooted bugs and optimized the system to handle real-time sensor data via RPC transfer protocols.
experiences.reasoning: The description fits the role of an Embedded C++ Developer, involving specific technical competencies and tasks stated in the resume.

experiences.title: Python Developer
experiences.description: Modeled discrete mathematical Rough Set Theory concepts for Sensor Data Mining using Python. Successfully designed a custom-built library to process 65,536 objects in 2 minutes with 95% accuracy using linear regression.
reference_context: Worked under the guidance of Ms. Vanita Agarwal, Assistant Professor, Department of Electronics & Telecommunication Engineering, College of Engineering, Pune.
Successfully modeled discrete mathematical Rough Set Theory concepts for Sensor Data Mining using Python.
Designed custom-built library to process 65,536 objects in 2 minutes with accuracy of 95% using linear regression.
experiences.reasoning: The duties and skills required for this position align with the resume's description of work as a Python Developer.
